Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Model: RA07 TUF K3 GEN II/RD/CA/DS ABS
Part Number: 90MP0390-BKAA01


Keyboard
Keyboard Interface: USB 2.0
Design Style: Gaming
Layout: 96%
Palm Rest: No
Function Keys: 8 Keys (F1-F8) Programmable
Mechanical Keyboard: Yes
Key Switch: Optical Switch
Keycaps: ABS doubleshot ABS painted
Keyboard Color: Black
Backlit: Per-Key RGB LEDs
Dimensions: 15.16" x 6.02" x 1.5"
Type: 2.4 GHz / Bluetooth / Wired


Features
Features: Compact & portable layout: 97-key design frees up more space for the mousing hand, and better portability.
IP57 waterproof & dust resistance: Industry-leading protection for easy cleaning and long-lasting durability.
Silicone gasket mount & dampening foam: Absorb pinging noises and echoes provide improved keystrokes acoustics for unrivaled typing experiences.
Optical-mechanical RGB switches: Featuring N-key rollover, 100% anti-ghost, 100-million-keypress lifespan, along with RGB LEDs for all-round per-key lighting.
Detachable top plate: Create different looks and allows for easy cleaning and maintenance.
All-key RGB lighting & Aura Sync: 16.8 million colors, per-key RGB lighting, and ASUS Armoury Crate software for intuitive adjustments and syncing with ASUS Aura-enabled products.


Package Contents
Package Contents: 1 x TUF Gaming K3 Gen II Keyboard 
1 x Quick Start Guide 
1 x Warranty Card
Label: Teclado Asus TUF Gaming K3 Gen II
